a-progress/gapDegree.description: the gap degree of half circle, 0 ~ 360

a-progress/gapPosition.description: the gap position, options: top bottom left right

a-progress/showInfo.description: whether to display the progress value and the status icon

a-progress/status.description: to set the status of the Progress, options: normal success exception active

a-progress/strokeWidth.description:
to set the width of the progress bar, unit: px.
to set the width of the circular progress bar, unit: percentage of the canvas width

a-progress/strokeLinecap.description: to set the style of the progress linecap

a-progress/strokeColor.optionType: string | ({ direction?: string; } & StringGradients) | ({ direction?: string; } & FromToGradients)

a-progress/successPercent.description: segmented success percent, works when type="line"

a-progress/type.description: to set the type, options: line circle dashboard

a-progress/width.description: to set the canvas width of the circular progress bar, unit: px
